name: Perfect Dark
description: Joanna Dark has almost finished her training, but she isn't a Carrington Institute agent just yet. She has only one test left - but this time, her mission is for real. In it, she will uncover a far-reaching conspiracy that will introduce her to the shadowy dataDyne Corporation and hint at things to come... Lots of ways to play! Snipe from long range, commandeer an enemy vehicle, even shoot from a first-person view. Huge bosses! From helicopters to giant cyborg spiders, go up against some of the most intimidating bosses ever to appear on Game Boy!
